actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to provide for allocations of general revenue sharing funds to certain special purpose units of local government.

summary.text: Provides for allocations of general revenue sharing funds to special purpose units of local government under the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972.

titles.title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to provide for allocations of general revenue sharing funds to certain special purpose units of local government.
